content: loop only - all odd numbered row will be worked in colour a - all even numbered row will be worked in colour b other than row 0 which will be worked in colour a - sometimes more than one stitch will be worked into the same front loop such as when a rdc follows a double_crochet or a double_crochet follows a ldc some front loops will be skipped entirely such as when a ldc follows a double_crochet if this is the first shelf in your bookcase start at row 0 if this will be worked into pre-existing crochet start at row 1b row 0 in colour a ch41 ch1 turn your work 41 42 row 15 in colour a 1dc 3sc *1dc 1sc repeat from * 3 times 3sc 1dc **1sc 4dc repeat from ** 2 times 11sc 5dc row 1a starting in the second chain from the hook single_crochet in 1dc every chain 40 41 go to row 2 row 16 in colour b 1sc 3dc *1sc 1dc repeat from * 3 row 1b in colour a 40sc 1sc 40 41 times 3dc 1sc 1dc 3sc 1ldc 4sc 10ldc 7sc 1sc from this point the work should not be turned all row row 17 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 3 times 1sc should be worked from right to left on the same side the 1dc 1sc 2dc 2sc 2dc 12sc 7dc 1dc stitch count of every row should be 40 41 row 18 in colour b *1sc 3dc repeat from * 3 times 1dc row 2 in colour b single_crochet in every stitch 1sc 1dc 3sc 1rdc 1sc 10ldc 10sc 1sc row 3 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 3 times 1sc 1dc row 19 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 3 times 1sc 19sc 8dc 1dc 1dc 1sc 3dc 12sc 10dc 1dc row 4 in colour b *1sc 3dc repeat from * 2 times 1sc 1dc row 20 in colour b *1sc 3dc repeat from * 3 times 1dc 2sc **1dc 1sc repeat from ** 9 times 2sc 2rdc 6sc 1sc 1sc 1dc 5sc 8ldc 12sc 1sc row 5 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 2 times 1dc 1sc row 21 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 3 times 1sc 2dc **1sc 1dc repeat from ** 9 times 2dc 2sc 6dc 1dc 1dc 3sc 2dc 9sc 2dc 1sc 9dc 1dc row 6 in colour b 1sc 3dc *1sc 1dc repeat from * 3 times row 22 in colour b *1sc 3dc repeat from * 3 times 1dc 3dc 1sc 1dc 17sc 2dc 6sc 1sc 1sc 1dc 1sc 1rdc 1sc 3dc 3sc 5rdc 1ldc 10sc 1sc row 7 in colour a 1dc 3sc *1dc 1sc repeat from * 3 times row 23 in colour a *1dc 3sc repeat from * 3 times 1sc 3sc 1dc 1sc 17dc 2sc 5dc 1sc 1dc 1dc 1sc 1dc 5sc 3dc 5sc 1ldc 1sc 9dc 1dc row 8 in colour b 1sc
